# distanceAttenuationModel

**Instance Property**

The distance attenuation model that describes the drop-off in gain as the source moves away from the listener.

## Declaration

```swift
var distanceAttenuationModel: AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel/inverse] attenuation model.

## Getting and Setting the Attenuation Model

- **AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel**: Types of distance attenuation models.
